short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this is just an analog clock that shows the time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Analog Clock Chrome Extension - a simple and user-friendly tool for your browser. This extension displays an analog clock that shows the time, date, and month in a clear and intuitive format. Stay informed and enhance your browsing experience with this handy time display.

With the Analog Clock Chrome Extension, you can effortlessly keep track of the current time, date, and month without any fuss. The analog clock provides a straightforward and easy-to-read display, ensuring that you stay organized and informed while browsing the web. Say goodbye to digital clocks and embrace the simplicity of the Analog Clock Chrome Extension.
